name: Fortune Cookies
description: Fortune Cookies is a hybrid cannabis strain that combines the famed genetics of Girl Scout Cookies and OG Kush in a potent mix of earthy, honeyed flavors. OG Kush genes are already present in Girl Scout Cookies, but Fortune Cookies has pronounced characteristics that OG fans will appreciate. Sativa genetics usually lead the way with Fortune Cookies, inducing a soaring, long-lasting buzz perfect for creative escapes. This hybrid can hit hard in larger doses, pushing past the confines of a subtle buzz into the weighty “couch-lock” effects typically associated with indica strains.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Euphoric, Happy, Creative, Uplifted, Pain, Stress, Depression, Muscle Spasms, Inflammation, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Anxious, Paranoid, Dizzy
